mapper.select: SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, b.id as revid, b.type as revtype_name, b.value as revvalue, b.value_name as revvalue_name, b.value_code as revvalue_code, b.created_date as revcreated_date, b.created_by as revcreated_by, b.updated_date as revupdated_date, b.updated_by as revupdated_by, b.delete_flag as revdelete_flag, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d ON c.order_statusval = d.value where a.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.type = 'orderStatus' and (d.type = 'orderStatus' or d.type is null)

SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, b.id as revid, b.type as revtype_name, b.value as revvalue, b.value_name as revvalue_name, b.value_code as revvalue_code, b.created_date as revcreated_date, b.created_by as revcreated_by, b.updated_date as revupdated_date, b.updated_by as revupdated_by, b.delete_flag as revdelete_flag, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d ON c.order_statusval = d.value WHERE b.type = 'orderStatus' and (d.type = 'orderStatus' or d.type is null)
and (a.order_statusval = #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER} or c.order_statusval = #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and a.order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.order_deleted is null

SELECT a.order_id as revorder_id, a.order_no as revorder_no, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_datetime as revorder_datetime, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, a.order_userid as revorder_userid, a.order_hometime as revorder_hometime, a.order_addressid as revorder_addressid, a.order_addressprovince as revorder_addressprovince, a.order_addresscity as revorder_addresscity, a.order_addresscounty as revorder_addresscounty, a.order_addressstreet as revorder_addressstreet, a.order_addressconsignee as revorder_addressconsignee, a.order_addressmobile as revorder_addressmobile, a.order_deleted as revorder_deleted, a.order_statusval as revorder_statusval, b.id as revid, b.type as revtype_name, b.value as revvalue, b.value_name as revvalue_name, b.value_code as revvalue_code, b.created_date as revcreated_date, b.created_by as revcreated_by, b.updated_date as revupdated_date, b.updated_by as revupdated_by, b.delete_flag as revdelete_flag, c.*, d.* FROM lad_rev_order a LEFT JOIN s_dictionary b ON a.order_statusval = b.value LEFT JOIN lad_order c ON a.order_id = c.order_revorderid LEFT JOIN s_dictionary d ON c.order_statusval = d.value where a.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.type = 'orderStatus' and (d.type = 'orderStatus' or d.type is null)
select (count(1) + 1) as serial from lad_rev_order where date_format(order_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into lad_rev_order (order_id, order_no, order_datetime, order_statusval, order_userid, order_hometime, order_addressid, order_addressprovince, order_addresscity, order_addresscounty, order_addressstreet, order_addressconsignee, order_addressmobile, order_deleted) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into lad_rev_order
order_id,
order_no,
order_datetime,
order_statusval,
order_userid,
order_hometime,
order_addressid,
order_addressprovince,

order_addresscounty,

order_addressmobile,
order_deleted,

mapper.update:
update lad_rev_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_statusval = #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_hometime = #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lad_rev_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_datetime = #{orderDatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_statusval = #{orderStatusval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_userid = #{orderUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_hometime = #{orderHometime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressid = #{orderAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_addressprovince = #{orderAddressprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscity = #{orderAddresscity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addresscounty = #{orderAddresscounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressstreet = #{orderAddressstreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressconsignee = #{orderAddressconsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_addressmobile = #{orderAddressmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_deleted = #{orderDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
